title: List of spells by book
data:
{{version031}}
This is a list of all spells available for the player in Crawl, organized by [[spell book]].

Bear in mind that [[randart]] [[spellbooks]] also appear in the Dungeon, containing a random selection of spells that usually follow a particular theme.

{{spell table by book}}

==See also==
* [[List of spells]] (alphabetical)
* [[List of spells by level]]
* [[List of spells by flag]] (helpful, unholy, etc.)
* [[List of spells by school]]

[[Category:Spells]]
[[Category:List]]
